::DevilDuer::

"Hmm?" DevilDuer says as he walks through the exit of the ship only 
to bump into a wall of dirt.

"Hmm, looks like we-"

He's interrupted as a work drone drills through the dirt, a tunnel 
behind him.

"Well, here's our exit, he says, going through the tunnel.
